Texts.Chs: 其他的能源选择包括太阳能、燃烧、裂变和量子发电。每种方法都各有利弊，你一定会想把它们都试一试的。
Texts.Eng: Other options for power include Solar, Combustion, Fission and Quantum power generation. Each has pros and cons. You'll definitely want to try them all.

Texts.Chs: 你可以通过多种方式发电。^orange;交流发电机^reset;有点过于简单了，尝试制造一个^orange;风力涡轮机^reset;，看看它们在风暴中是多么有用吧！
Texts.Eng: You can generate power in many ways. ^orange;Alternator^reset; generators are just the simplest. Try building a ^orange;Wind Turbine^reset;, and see how useful they get in a windstorm!
